sentence.Network_en: As a Liberal Democrat I subscribe to the internationalist approach.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为自由民主党成员，我支持国际主义路线。
参加国际比赛的苏格兰橄榄球队队员

sentence.Network_en: Maintaining world peace is our unshirkable internationalist duty.
sentence.Network_cn: 维护世界和平是我们义不容辞的国际主义义务.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 用现代名词来表示,他是国际主义者(internationalist),也是理想主义者(idealist)。其最终目的为建立互赖互利的国际秩序。果能如此,则国与国之间自不会有战争发生。.
international investmentinternationalist国际主义者期刊internationalization国际化

list.abs: The Chinese people stand by their proletarian internationalist duties ., 中国人民忠于自己的无产阶级国际主义义务.
Maintaining world peace is our unshirkable internationalist duty ., 维护世界和平是我们义不容辞的国际主义义务.
we must always be ready to learn from the people of fraternal countries and maintain a genuine internationalist spirit .对兄弟国家人民要永远保持学习的态度，要有真正的国际主义精神。
They praised him as a proletarian internationalist fighter of the Bethune type ., 他们称赞他是白求恩式的无产阶级国际主义战士.

entry.def: If someone has internationalist beliefs or opinions, they believe that countries should work with, help, and be friendly with one another.

example.ex: As a Liberal Democrat I subscribe to the internationalist approach.
example.tran: 作为自由民主党成员,我支持国际主义路线。

means.word_mean: 2. a member of a socialist or communist international

auth_sentence.content: He was, he said, an internationalist, but not a Marxist.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was, he said, an internationalist, but not a Marxist.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was, he said, an internationalist, but not a Marxist.

auth_sentence.content: It was a world that was internationalist, vibrant, united, optimistic.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was a world that was internationalist, vibrant, united, optimistic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was a world that was internationalist, vibrant, united, optimistic.

auth_sentence.content: He joked that the Cuban doctors must be guerrillas on an internationalist mission.
auth_sentence.res_content: He joked that the Cuban doctors must be guerrillas on an internationalist mission.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He joked that the Cuban doctors must be guerrillas on an internationalist mission.
